<title level="1" right="Action">[Flyby Attack](/Actions.aspx?ID=16) <actions string="Two Actions" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 215 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

The bird Flies and makes a talon Strike at any point along the way.
name: Flyby Attack
